issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement Quarter Function Alias
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14552](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14552). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns the quarter of the year for a date, timestamp, or string in the range 1 to 4. Example: quarter('2015-04-08') = 2.
